website_summaries.verdict: The best budget BenQ projector for business and home use without spending a lot of money.
pros: Small size and simple set up make the projector somewhat portable for business presentations
Choose between different lamp options for a more savings or a better image
cons: Lacks a large range to resize the image to different wall or projection screen sizes

customer_reviews.title: This projector is a light cannon
customer_reviews.text: I spent weeks deciding what projector to add to my low end home theater. It is not a high resolution projector, but once the movie starts on my 100" screen, it draws me into the story, with the bright picture, and good color. I watched Avatar in 3d last weekend and the 3d picture was darker than on my tv, but the huge picture and effective 3d resolution more than made up for it. For the $225.00 i paid for it, I don't think I could have done better than this Benq.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Did the job I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality item, arrived on-time and fully operational. Have only used it a couple of times, but the unit is easy to set up and use. Suggest downloading the User Manual. I had several text documents that were typed single spaced and digitized for the presentation. You could read them OK, but it was a bit fuzzy. If I had to do it all over again, I would have opted for the higher definition optics in the next higher level projector. Had I more time to prepare for the presentation, another option would have been to edit (re-type) the documents. I believe that would have helped in my situation, too.
customer_reviews.author: MX

customer_reviews.title: Description is false!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this in today and it didn’t even have a remote or power cords!!!! There was nothing in the web description about missing a remote. If I can’t get this thing to work it will be returned
customer_reviews.author: kiyacorley

customer_reviews.title: I actually viewed a few other "cheaper" options but I am glad I purchased this one instead
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to decide on a budget projector. I actually viewed a few other "cheaper" options but I am glad I purchased this one instead. Amazing picture and quality. It even shows pretty good in a well lit room. I would absolutely recommend. However, you will need an external audio system because the speakers aren't that good. You can barely hear it when the volume is at max.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not have keystone adjustments or capability to play from Micca Spek
customer_reviews.text: Projector does not allow for video to be played from a standard video player such as Micca Spek. Has zero keystone capabilities. Benq customer service is absolutely horrible; there only concern is to get you off of the line as soon as possible. If you purchase through Amazon they will refer you back to Amazon 100% of the time. They will cut you off before you have finished addressing concerns and disconnect the call if you match their tone. BIG MISTAKE trying a product from a no-name company.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money - no cons to report so far
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for money. Works perfectly with excellent reproduction. No cons to report so far. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Eaton Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting a digital projector for my home theatre and this one fits the bill. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Albert H. Hardee

customer_reviews.title: Good picture, but too small and poor audio.
customer_reviews.text: Projector was good quality, but the picture was much smaller than my old projector and the sound was terrible. Even when plugged into speakers it had very low audio. I'd rather pay a bit more for an Epson and get a much higher quality projector.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Hajjar

customer_reviews.title: Only One Thing
customer_reviews.text: All is swell with this product. Just one thing, I cannot get the projection size to increase beyond set limits in the hardware. Frustrating, but the picture quality is beautiful, bright and sharp and the remote is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bibleway Press

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!!!!! but  the sound quality is poor
customer_reviews.text: Good Product!!!!! but the sound quality is poor even when you use your external speaker have to turn up volume at high level
customer_reviews.author: zamunda shrestha

customer_reviews.title: Better than Computer Screen!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent projector! It’s funny to see how the image on the screen is a marked improvement over the one on the computer!
customer_reviews.author: MichaelG

customer_reviews.title: shit's legit
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at cheaper projectors but decided to go with a name brand for a little more money. I used it 5 hours a day for a few months and it works great. I usually close the curtains but it still works fine in some light
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Brinkman

customer_reviews.title: Bulb died way too soon
customer_reviews.text: Only had it two years and very infrequently used. Bulb died with it having probably less than a few hundred hours - rated for 2,000. Cost of bulb is as much as the projector so, not a good value!
customer_reviews.author: Amory Mellen

customer_reviews.title: Now we have a small family cinema!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, good picture quality: both brightness and resolution. Super easy to connect to a regular PC or laptop. Digital screen-shape tuning is very useful. Well done, BenQ.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Sound from speaker
customer_reviews.text: At Level 10 you can hardly hear the speakers Sent it back and got second one same thing Support close on BenQ weekend check connections rest to default settings swap cables and port Still hardly any sound
customer_reviews.author: Stevemmmett

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Does the job we needed it to do, was easy to set up and navigate.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Lose the remote
customer_reviews.text: Really good but I lost my remote and was wondering if I can get a replacement any help on how to without purchasing a whole new projector
customer_reviews.author: Cash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very bright easy to install easy to setup looks awesome lights on or off definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Landor

customer_reviews.title: Good PPT quality
customer_reviews.text: I use it to show powerpoint presentations from my laptop and I'm pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Onika M.

customer_reviews.title: Bright even in during the day.
customer_reviews.text: It has performed as promised. I plan on enjoying this projector for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Bertrum R. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, wonderful value.
customer_reviews.text: Great, bright projector! I'm able to watch the world cup in the mornings with our mini blinds pulled only in a very bright room.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: projector
customer_reviews.text: this is my first projector. After reading most reviews. this one is perfect for home. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: madhu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Lighting is not an issue. Not noisy. Like it.
customer_reviews.author: Frantz Fenelon

customer_reviews.title: Best quality for your dollar.
customer_reviews.text: Great projector plays just like a TV. You will not regret buying this one.
customer_reviews.author: Pwbrown Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It took almost 2 months to find a GOOD, REASONABLY priced projector. I've used it daily for 3 months now waiting for something bad to happen. Its performed flawlessly and I have to say I'm thoroughly impressed. The clarity is awesome. You can hear the fan running but it doesn't disturb your viewing. All my friends have been impressed by it. It's not the top of the line, but quality is so good, no one will ever know. The only thing that was challenging was getting the sound out to my surround system. I purchase a HDMI audio extractor on Amazon for about $20 and that did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Brandrick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and has great color resolution. You will not be disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought an optoma hd20 years ago and lately its been failing so after shopping around this had better stats in almost every department
customer_reviews.text: NOT A HDMI projector. I bought an optoma hd20 years ago and lately its been failing so after shopping around this had better stats in almost every department. But when I used it it was low low low resolution barely did 800x600 couldn't even make out the words on my computer that it was hooked up to. It was not widesceen only 4:3. I suppose this would be good for a office or something that it doesn't really matter but not a home theater system.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hartson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Super bright for the price, picture is in my living room where I use 100 watt leds lights.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Best quality with price.
customer_reviews.text: With this price I think this is the best projector to buy. Picture quality is amazing and outstanding. Even though delivery was before time. I would say 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Bilal

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Will be a great part of your entertainment system.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Very poor customer support
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy LED projector from Benq. It did not last more than 4 years for me. And now they don't have spare to repair it. Not sure about the one with Lamp. But please be careful, because once its damaged, support is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Ratish
